name: TrashBall
description:
TrashBall : 

TrashBall is a multiplayer coop game where you and a friend try to score against a crowd of furious opponents.

The game offers 9 different levels and supports local and online multiplayer.

Controls :

Keyboard : 

WASD/Arrow Keys : Move

Space/Enter : Pass if you have the ball, otherwise gain a speed boost

Controller :

Same thing with the joystick and the right button.
